document_data.name: Askalan Larcloaks
document_data.mainbody: '''Askalan Larcloaks''' was a [[gnome]] wheelwright in [[Immerford]] in [[Cormyr]].
document_data.History: In [[1480 DR]], Askalan and other wealthy citizens went to protest to Lord [[Lothan Durncaskyn]] about an unseen thief and murderer. He protested about the detention of Lords [[Cornyn Risingbroke]] and [[Yarland Amflame]] inside [[Castle Irlingstar]].
